metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16707 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Hunspell 1.7.0 has an invalid read operation inSuggestMgr::leftcommonsubstring in suggestmgr.cxx.

criterions.comment: postbooks: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
enchant package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
hunspell package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
